features.name: Cherni Vrah
features.fact: The highest peak in Vitosha, popular for skiing and hiking.

features.name: Skoparnika
features.fact: Famous for its beautiful views of Sofia and the surrounding mountain peaks.

features.name: Golyam Kupen
features.fact: Popular among tourists for its easy ascent and picturesque nature.

features.name: Ushite
features.fact: Known for its rock formations resembling ears.

features.name: Malak Rezen
features.fact: A lower neighbor of Golyam Rezen, offering great mountain views.

features.name: Chernata Skala
features.fact: Known for its dark rocks and scenic views.

features.name: Luvcheto
features.fact: A small peak shaped like a lion's head.

features.name: Samara
features.fact: Famous for its steep slopes and views of Sofia.

features.name: Gola Mogila
features.fact: A low peak suitable for easy hikes and walks.

features.name: Nakev Kamak
features.fact: A small peak with interesting rock formations.

features.name: Golyam Kapral
features.fact: A low peak popular for family hikes and picnics.

features.name: Kukulya
features.fact: Known for its rounded shapes and greenery.

features.name: Malak Kapral
features.fact: A smaller neighbor of Golyam Kapral, suitable for walks.

features.name: Malak Lygator
features.fact: A low peak, ideal for short hiking routes.

features.name: Kamen Del
features.fact: Known for its rocky slopes and views.

features.name: Sredets
features.fact: A central peak offering panoramic views of Vitosha.

features.name: Goli Vrah
features.fact: Known for its large, open spaces.

features.name: Komini
features.fact: Famous for its rock formations resembling chimneys.

features.name: Kopitoto
features.fact: A small peak shaped like a hoof.

features.name: Tsurkva
features.fact: Famous for its historical and religious landmarks.

features.name: Palilupa
features.fact: A low peak suitable for peaceful walks.

features.name: Bogdana
features.fact: Famous for its green meadows and views.

features.name: Ostretz
features.fact: Known for its steep slopes and views.

features.name: Piperkata
features.fact: A small peak with an interesting shape and views.

features.name: Momina Skala
features.fact: Known for its legends and beautiful views.

features.name: Sui Vrah
features.fact: A low peak, popular for light walks and picnics.

features.name: Ostritsa
features.fact: Known for its steep slopes and views.

features.name: Vladaiski Cherni Vrah
features.fact: Famous for its dark rocks and views.

features.name: Balabana
